short_description: Designed to keep drive belt at proper tension
Some ACDelco Gold parts may have formerly appeared as ACDelco Professional
Premium aftermarket replacement part

product_description: ACDelco Gold (Professional) 90 Degree Molded Accessory Drive Belt Tensioner Assemblies are the high quality alternative to Original Equipment (OE) parts. These 90 degree molded belt tensioner assemblies are very important in optimal operation of the accessory belt drive system. The tensioner maintains the correct amount of tension on the belt throughout operation.  ACDelco Gold (Professional) parts are manufactured to meet your expectations for fit, form, and function, making them a smart choice for General Motors vehicles, as well as most makes and models, including special applications. These high-quality parts are backed by General Motors. Some ACDelco Gold parts may have formerly appeared as ACDelco Professional.

short_description: [Vehicle Fitment-1]: Compatible with Cadillac Escalade 2002, Escalade EXT 2002 V8 6.0L, Avalanche 1500 2002 V8 5.3L, Silverado 1500 1999-2001 V8 4.8L, Silverado 1500 1999-2002 V8 5.3L; Compatible with Chevrolet Silverado 1500 HD/2500 HD 2001-2002 V8 6.0L, Silverado 2500 1999-2002 V8 5.3L/6.0L, Silverado 3500 2001-2002 V8 6.0L, Suburban 1500 2000-2002 V8 5.3L/6.0L, Tahoe 2000-2002 V8 4.8L/5.3L --- Fits 105A. or 100A Alternator
[Kit Parts Included]: ① 1x Serpentine Belt; ② 1x Belt Tensioner; ③ 1x Idler Pulley

[Functions]: A-Premium engine serpentine belt drive kit usually locates at the front of the engine and wraps around a set of sprockets. It ensures the connection between the camshaft and crankshaft, making the pistons and valves work together in the correct sequence. It will help the engine run normally, improve fuel efficiency, and thus effectively optimise the engine's performance.
